00034 #include <nucleus/thread.h>

00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNDREORD 0x00000001     /* Don't reorder pend queues upon prio change */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICK         XNARCH_DEFAULT_TICK
00073 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00074 
00075 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00076 
00077 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00078 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00079 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00080 
00081 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00083 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00084 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00085 
00086 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00087 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00121 typedef struct xnsched {
00122 
00123     xnflags_t status;           
00125     xnthread_t *runthread;      
00127     xnarch_cpumask_t resched;

00143 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00144 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__)                  \
00145     ((__sched__) - &nkpod->sched[0])
00146 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00147 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__) (0)
00148 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00149 
00150 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00151     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00152 
00153 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00154     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00155 
00156 #define xnsched_tst_resched(__sched__) \
00157     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00158 
00159 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__) \
00160     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00161 
00162 #define xnsched_clr_resched(__sched__) \
00163     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00164 
00165 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00166     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00267 static inline void xnpod_reset_watchdog (void)
00268 {
00269     nkpod->watchdog_trigger = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc() + nkpod->watchdog_reload;
00270     nkpod->watchdog_armed = 0;
00271 }

00278 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00279 {
00280     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00281     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00282 }
00283 
00284 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00285 {
00286     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00287         pod->minpri + incr :
00288         pod->minpri - incr;
00289 }
00290 
00291 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00292 {
00293     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00294         pod->maxpri - incr :
00295         pod->maxpri + incr;
00296 }
00297 
00298 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio)
00299 {
00300     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00301        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00302     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00303     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00304 }
00305 
00306 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00307 
00308 {
00309     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00310     spl_t s;
00311 
00312     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00313     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00314     if (rootcb->cprio != prio) { /* No round-robin effect. */
00315         rootcb->cprio = prio;
00316         xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00317     }
00318     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00319 }

00321     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00322 
00323 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00324     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00325 
00326 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00327     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00328 
00329 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00330     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00331 
00332 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00333     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00334 
00335 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00336     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00337 
00338 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00339     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00340 
00341 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00342     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00343 
00344 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00345     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00346 
00347 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00348     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00349 
00350 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00351     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00352 
00353 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00354     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00355 
00356 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00357     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00358 
00359 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00360     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00361 
00362 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00363     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00364 
00365 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00366     (xnpod_root_p())
00367 
00368 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00369 
00370 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00371     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00373 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void) {
00374     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00375 }
00376 
00377 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void) {
00378     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00379     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00380 }
00381 
00382 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks) {
00383     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00384 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_HW_PERIODIC_TIMER
00385     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00386 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_HW_PERIODIC_TIMER */
00387     return ticks;
00388 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_HW_PERIODIC_TIMER */
00389 }
00390 
00391 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t) {
00392 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_HW_PERIODIC_TIMER
00393     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00394 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_HW_PERIODIC_TIMER */
00395     return t;
00396 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_HW_PERIODIC_TIMER */
00397 }

00453 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00454 {
00455     /* Don't swap these two lines... */
00456     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->schedlck);
00457     __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00458 }
00459 
00460 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00461 {
00462     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->schedlck))
00463         {
00464         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00465         xnpod_schedule();
00466         }
00467 }
00468 
00469 static inline void xnpod_lock_timers (void)
00470 {
00471     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->timerlck);
00472     setbits(nkpod->status,XNTLOCK);
00473 }
00474 
00475 static inline void xnpod_unlock_timers (void)
00476 {
00477     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->timerlck))
00478         clrbits(nkpod->status,XNTLOCK);
00479 }

00510 static inline void xnpod_yield (void) {
00511     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00512     xnpod_schedule();
00513 }

00515 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout) {
00516     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00517 }

00519 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void) {

00521 }

00523 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void) {
00524     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
